reviews.text: Cruise Whitsundays (owner)a month agoThank you for sharing such a detailed review! We're glad you had a smooth start at Airlie Beach and enjoyed the activities and stops throughout the day. It’s great to hear the weather was perfect and that you made the most of Whitehaven Beach, Hamilton Island, and Daydream Island. We’ll pass your kind words on to the team—they’ll really appreciate it. Thanks again for recommending us!

reviews.text: Had a full day chill & grill tour with CW the other day in August. Awesome weather a bit chill but sunny and no rain and you will have a good chance to spot whales along the way to Whitsunday island. Everything is amazing. We allow to spend …More

reviews.text: Cruise Whitsundays (owner)a month agoThank you for your wonderful review! We're so glad you had an amazing time on the Chill & Grill tour and got to enjoy such perfect weather — plus some whale spotting along the way! It’s great to hear Sarah and the rest of the team made your day special, and that you enjoyed the lunch and relaxed cruise. We really appreciate your feedback about wanting more time at Hill Inlet — it’s such a magical spot, and we’ll definitely pass that on. Can’t wait to welcome you back!

reviews.text: Had an enjoyable full day trip to Hill Inlet and Whitehaven Beach. Departed from Port of Airlie where there is delicious coffee and plenty of places to sit. My second trip to Whitehaven. Did a half day tour with another company and didn’t …More

reviews.text: Cruise Whitsundays (owner)a month agoThanks for your detailed feedback — we're really glad you enjoyed the day overall, especially the whale sightings, stunning views, and our friendly crew. We appreciate you pointing out areas for improvement, including the wait at the Southern End, food hygiene, and the confusion around drinks. We will make sure to review these issues to make the experience smoother and more enjoyable. Sorry again for the delay on the return trip — we understand how frustrating that can be. Thanks for choosing Cruise Whitsundays, and we hope to welcome you back again soon!

reviews.text: Cruise Whitsundays (owner)a month agoWow – thank you for such a fantastic and detailed review! We're thrilled to hear you had an unforgettable day out on Camira. From snorkeling the reef to walking on Whitehaven and spotting marine life on the way back — it sounds like a true Whitsundays adventure! We’ll be sure to pass your lovely feedback on to the crew. Thanks again for recommending us.
